title-part.text: INDEXING SCHEME RELATING TO FOODS, FOODSTUFFS OR NON-ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES

note.note-paragraph: This subclass constitutes an internal scheme for indexing only.

title-part.text: Food compositions, function of food ingredients or processes for food or foodstuffs

note.note-paragraph: Indexing codes of main groups A23V2200/00, A23V2250/00 and A23V2300/00 are used in combination as C-sets with the base symbol A23V2002/00 to indicate the composition, function of ingredients or processes.
The indexing codes of this group are used in combination with the ingredients compositions codes
The indexing codes under this group are used in combination with the codes for ingredients compositions

title-part.text: Food product presented as a kit of parts
Food product presented as a toy or amusement
Ingredients acting on or related to the structure
Food, ingredients or supplements targeted to meet non-medical requirements, e.g. environmental, religious
All vegan ingredients, i.e. all animal product free
Foods, ingredients or supplements having a functional effect on health
having a modulating effect on age
having a modulation effect on allergy and risk of allergy
having an effect on bone mass, e.g. osteoporosis prevention
having an effect on cancer prevention
having an effect on comfort perception and well-being
having an effect on dental health
having an effect on lung or respiratory system
having an effect on regeneration or building of ligaments or muscles
having an effect on skin health and hair or coat
having an effect on the health of the digestive tract
Prebiotics, ingredients fermented in the gastrointestinal tract by beneficial microflora
Probiotics, living bacteria to be ingested for action in the digestive tract
having an effect on the health of the nervous system or on mental function
having an effect on the immune system
having an effect on blood cholesterol
having effect on glycaemic control and diabetes
High-energy foods and drinks, sports drinks
Promoters of weight control and weight loss
treating the effects of consuming alcohol, narcotics or other addictive behavior, e.g. treating hangover or reducing blood alcohol levels
Sugars, e.g. mono-, di-, tri-, tetra-saccharides
Electrical treatment, e.g. electrolysis, electrical field treatment, with or without heating effect

note.note-paragraph: To be combined with A23V2300/24 in case of heating effect

title-part.text: Concentrating, enriching or enhancing in functional factors
